title: Leukocyte classification to predict diseases (Part 2)
excerpt: Data analysis on number of blood cells, which are white blood cells and red blood cells, per a certain blood volume could help us observe our medical situation. In this blog, we introduce a faster method to recognize disease via the number of leukocytes.

title: Leukocyte classification to predict diseases (Part 1)
excerpt: Data analysis on number of blood cells, which are white blood cells and red blood cells, per a certain blood volume could help us observe our medical situation. In this blog, we introduce a faster method to recognize disease via the number of leukocytes.

title: Real-time emotion recognizing
excerpt: Introduce a deep learning approach to the problem of recognizing emotions in real time.

title: Detect COVID-19 with Deep Learning
excerpt: Propose a rapidly testing method which has a high productivity in a short time, which is to use Deep Convolutional Neural Network to detect COVID-19 on Chest X-ray (CXR) images to cope with the present pandemic.
